item.title: NYKE AIR ZOOM PEGASUS 38 LIMITED EDITION
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: Your workhorse with wings returns.The Nyke Air Zoom Pegasus 38 continues to put a spring in your step, using the same responsive foam as its predecessor.Mesh in the upper combines the comfort and durability you want with a fit that nods back to the classic Peg.This special edition features multiple colours coming together to celebrate the Pegasus legacy.
item.content:encoded:
• Description
  • Additional Information
  • Reviews (7)
  • Delivery Information
RESPONSIVE TRAINING WITH THE RIGHT FIT AND FEEL.

Your workhorse with wings returns.The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38 continues to put a spring in your step, using the same responsive foam as its predecessor.Mesh in the upper combines the comfort and durability you want with a fit that
nods back to the classic Peg.This special edition features multiple colours coming together to celebrate the Pegasus legacy.

A Colourful Celebration

This exclusive version of the Pegasus 38 features a mix of colourways on one shoe.It celebrates the diverse spectrum and history of the Pegasus.

Something Old, Something New

A wider forefoot means more space for your toes, while the shoe’s fit maintains the comfortable feel you expect from the Pegasus.Mesh in the upper provides a breathable and plush sensation that stretches with your foot for optimal
shape and fit.

Spring With Your Step

Nike React foam is lightweight, springy and durable.More foam means better cushioning without extra bulk.We tuned the forefoot Zoom Air unit to feel softer and give you more bounce with every step.It’s closer to your foot for a
responsive sensation.

Secure Fit

Midfoot webbing tightens around your foot when you lace up, letting you choose your fit and feel.

More Benefits
  • Foam tongue helps reduce lace pressure on the top of your foot.
  • Colour Shown: Dark Smoke Grey/White/Flash Crimson/Volt
  • Style: DJ3129-001
  • Country/Region of Origin: China

Day hikes, thru hikes, travel or using them traditionally you will love these shoes. Spring summer, fall or winter we have shoes that will fit some and even all conditions! Running on trails these shoes offer lightweight and tackle rough trails, alpine, rocky dusty, muddy trails, snowy trails. Technical climbs and descents these shoes will be stable, rugged and durable. We have compiled this list from REAL testing in the pasific northwest and believe these are the best trail runners money can buy in 2021. These are so popular that ALL are available in both men and women’s models.

item.title: NYKE AIR MAX ALPHA TRAINER 4
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: Tackle your most intense workouts in the Nyke Air Max Alpha Trainer 4. The wide, flat base with Nike Air cushioning gives you comfortable stability for lifting. The heel is redesigned with supportive padding that helps take a load off during your heaviest sets. Everything comes together in a durable shoe built for the rigours of the gym.
item.content:encoded:
• Description
  • Additional Information
  • Reviews (7)
  • Delivery Information
STABLE CUSHIONING FOR THE TOUGHEST ROUTINES.

Tackle your most intense workouts in the Nike Air Max Alpha Trainer 4. The wide, flat base with Nike Air cushioning gives you comfortable stability for lifting. The heel is redesigned with supportive padding that helps take a load
off during your heaviest sets. Everything comes together in a durable shoe built for the rigours of the gym.

Reinforced to Support

The heel wrap meets the laces at the midfoot, for support during explosive moves. Durable mesh, tough eyestays and overlays let your foot breathe while standing up to the demands of everyday training.

Cushioned for Comfort

Foam with a Max Air unit at the heel cushions your foot, for comfort that lasts as long as you do. The collar pads your ankle from one move to the next.

Sturdy Foundation

The flat, wide sole with a rubber tread gives you stability and traction. Rubber wraps up the side to keep your foot firmly on the sole during lateral movement.
